sentences.en: Dress Code : Please Attend in Formal Dress or Fashion Finery.
sentences.cn: 着装要求: 敬请来宾以时尚或华丽服饰出席.

sentences.en: Even in the shop he persisted in his finery.
sentences.cn: 那怕是在铺子里干活,他也照样还是衣冠楚楚.

sentences.en: Every day, he through the street, dressed in cheap and vulgar finery.
sentences.cn: 他每天穿着廉价而俗气的华丽衣服, 招摇过市.

sentences.en: Her dresss was bedaubed with cheap finery.
sentences.cn: 她的衣裙上俗气地缀满了便宜的饰品.

sentences.en: I am decked out in my spring finery.
sentences.cn: 我穿着春天的漂亮服饰.

sentences.en: It was nothing now, a small, cheap, purchased article of finery.
sentences.cn: 当我一戴上手钚, 手钚却显得死气沉沉, 变成俗气便宜的小饰物.

sentences.en: Mother, it is no gain, thy bondage of finery.
sentences.cn: 母亲, 这是毫无好处的, 如你的华美的约束.

sentences.en: Now she paused at each individual bit of finery, where before she had hurried on.
sentences.cn: 她上次来这里时, 这地方给她留下了很好的印象.

sentences.en: People came to it in finery and carriages to see.
sentences.cn: 到这里来看戏的,都是衣着华丽、马车接送的人.

sentences.en: She equipped herself in all her finery.
She loved to adorn herself with finery.
sentences.cn: 她喜欢穿戴华丽的服饰.

sentences.en: She's ( all ) rigged out in her best finery.
sentences.cn: 她穿着她最华丽的服饰.

sentences.en: Such a crush of finery and folly she had never seen.
sentences.cn: 她可从未见过如此华丽挥霍的盛况.

sentences.en: The guests arrived in all their finery.
They arrayed themselves in all their finery.
We watched the stars arriving for the awards ceremony dressed up in all their finery.
sentences.cn: 我们看着明星们打扮得雍容华贵,来到了颁奖典礼.

trans.tran_cn: 华丽、优雅的服装或装饰
trans.tran_en: clothes and jewellery that are beautiful or very expensive, and are worn for a special occasion
